description: Gatorade&nbsp;Margarita Cocktails are a great way to enjoy the weather and have fun with your friends. This recipe is easy to make, and you can adjust it based on your desired&nbsp;alcohol content.
name: Gatorade Margarita
recipeIngredient: 20 oz. Bottle blue sports drinks, such as Cool Blue Gatorade

recipeInstructions.name: Combine the sports drink, lime juice, and tequila in a large pitcher and stir.
